name: GACC'EM
description:
GACC'EM is a jam  game based on hacking with theme of Conspiracy Theory.

In this game main character hacker corez with the help of GACC Org hunts down all the conspiracy theorist in Drone City. 

It is a currently on prototype level and in future we hope to turn it into some kind of hacker simulator.  Please check it out and give your feed back.
